subject: Boxing
lead_paragraph: Firat Arslan, a Turkish-born German, took away Virgil Hill’s World Boxing Association cruiserweight title, battering Hill with lefts in a unanimous decision in Dresden, Germany.On Friday night, Ricardo Mayorga scored a majority 12-round decision over Fernando Vargas in Los Angeles, winning on the strength of knockdowns in the 1st and 11th rounds.
